page.title: 08A DAY IN MY LIFE
page.content: I have lived in Dunstable all my life and can't remember it to be to different from today. It is not a very fast growing town due to the fact that there are not many new jobs or factories. A typical day without school would consist of me getting up around ten o'clock and going to see my friends. Sometimes we may journey to Luton on the bus to "doss" around the shops in the Arndale Centre or we may go to the video shop to hire a film. We may even watch a decent film at the cinema in Luton. Dunstable is not a very lively town so most people would journey to Luton for the night clubs or discos. Dunstable is a pretty usual boring small town, but is also quiet and has near housingin most places.
